name: Audrey Sunglasses
description:
AUDREY – meaning ‘Nobel Strength’

Available colours – Scarlet with red lenses, Matte Black with Black lenses, White Horn with Black lenses

These frames are 100% handmade in England using the highest quality acetate and fittings and are sold with a protective case & box.

‘Audrey’ sunglasses from Fan Optics featuring fitted ‘Sola by Carl Zeiss Vision Sunlenses’ which protect the wearer from high and prolonged levels of exposure to UV sunlight.
 
Available in one size:
Size 136 – L 136, H 53, Bridge 16, Temple 136
 
Delivery will be made approximately within 7-14 days after payment is received, due to the fact that the frames are held in limited stock and handmade.

If frames are shown as ‘out of stock’ please email us at sales@fanoptics.co.uk for stock updates.

Refunds and Exchanges can be accepted within 10 days after delivery, provided the items are in perfect condition & undamaged. Please refer to T&C’s.
